ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.model

Class WebStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.model.WebStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWebStorage

    public class WebStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWebStorage
    Class for interacting with the ES service The latest error string can be retrieved via getErrorString

      • getStories

        public java.util.List<Story> getStories(int from,
                               int size)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IWebStorage
        Tries to get "size" stories, starting at "from" from ES. May return less than "size" if end of stories is reached.
        Specified by:
        getStories in interface IWebStorage
        Parameters:
        from - the start index to return stories from
        size - the amount of stories to try to return
        Returns:
        List of stories
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getComments

        public java.util.List<Comment> getComments(java.util.UUID targetId,
                                  int from,
                                  int size)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IWebStorage
        Gets comments for the targetId. May be a StoryId or FragmentId. Will return up to size comments starting at from. Loads images if a comment contains one as well.
        Specified by:
        getComments in interface IWebStorage
        Parameters:
        targetId - The Story or StoryFragment to retrieve comments for.
        from - the start index to return comments from
        size - the amount of comments to try to return
        Returns:
        A List of comments
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public boolean putComment(Comment comment)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IWebStorage
        Puts a comment to ES. If a comment contains an image, it puts that in ES as well.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        comment - the Comment to save to ES
        Returns:
        True if succeeded, false otherwise.

        java.lang.Exception

                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IWebStorage

      • publishStory

        public boolean publishStory(Story story,
                   java.util.List<StoryFragment> fragments)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IWebStorage
        Publishes a Story to ES. Overwrites if already exists. Note: this does NOT check if the StoryFragments actually belong to the Story
        Specified by:
        publishStory in interface IWebStorage
        Parameters:
        story - the Story object to publish
        fragments - List of StoryFragments to publish
        Returns:
        True if succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
